trans-unit.source: Defines methods that a type implements to serialize and deserialize an object graph.
trans-unit.target: 定義型別實作序列化和還原序列化物件圖形的方法。

trans-unit.source: The IStateFormatter interface defines methods that a type can implement to serialize and deserialize the state that an ASP.NET Web server control maintains in its <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: IStateFormatter 介面會定義一個類型可以實作序列化和還原序列化的 ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項中維護狀態的方法與其<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: This infrastructure is used by classes that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister> class to maintain an ASP.NET page's state between requests.
trans-unit.target: 這項基礎結構由衍生自的<xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>類別，以維護要求之間的 ASP.NET 網頁的狀態。</xref:System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister>

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET page state is serialized and deserialized by an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter> class; however, site and adapter developers can implement the IStateFormatter interface on their own types to perform this work.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET 網頁的狀態會序列化並還原序列化的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter>類別; 但是，站台和配接器開發人員可以實作 IStateFormatter 介面上自己的類型，若要執行這項工作。</xref:System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter>

trans-unit.source: For more information about Web server control state management and view state, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Dynamic Web Server Controls and View State](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 Web 伺服器控制項的狀態管理和檢視狀態的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[動態 Web 伺服器控制項和檢視狀態](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Deserializes an object state graph from its serialized string form.
trans-unit.target: 還原序列化序列化的字串格式的物件狀態的圖。

trans-unit.source: Use the Deserialize method to reconstitute the state object for an ASP.NET page or server control that has been serialized using the <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateFormatter.Serialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 用於還原序列化方法 deserialization 使用已序列化的 ASP.NET 頁面或伺服器控制項的狀態物件<xref:System.Web.UI.IStateFormatter.Serialize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.IStateFormatter.Serialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateFormatter"></xref> deserializes into an initialized object.
trans-unit.target: 字串<xref href="System.Web.UI.IStateFormatter"></xref>初始化的物件還原序列化。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the state of an ASP.NET server control.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Serializes ASP.NET Web server control state to string form.
trans-unit.target: 將序列化成字串形式的 ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: Use the Serialize method to transform an object state graph to string form.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Serialize 方法轉換成字串形式的物件狀態圖。

trans-unit.source: Reconstitute a state object from the string using the <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateFormatter.Deserialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 重新建構所需的狀態物件，從使用字串<xref:System.Web.UI.IStateFormatter.Deserialize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.IStateFormatter.Deserialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object that represents the view state of the Web server control to serialize to string form.
trans-unit.target: 表示要序列化的 Web 伺服器控制項的檢視狀態的字串形式的物件。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents a Web server control's view state.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Web 伺服器控制項的檢視狀態的字串。
